com.ephesoft.dcma.util

Class NumberUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.util.NumberUtil

  • public final class NumberUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A Utility for performing number operations. This class provides functionality for performing operations on numbers like round up values etc.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft

    • Method Detail

      • getRoundedValue

        public static final double getRoundedValue(double doubleValue)
        Rounds off the double value up to 2 decimal digits. example : 12.456 would be rounded off to 12.45, 12.534 would be rounded off to 12.53.
        Parameters:
        doubleValue - Double value to be rounded off. If null, returns null.
        Returns:
        Double rounded double value.

      • compare

        value2 - int
        Returns:

        public static final boolean isValidLong(java.lang.String value)
        Checks if a string is a valid long value.
        Parameters:
        value - String String for check.
        Returns:
        True if input is a valid long value.

      • isValidPriorityRange

        public static final boolean isValidPriorityRange(java.lang.String value)
        Checks if a string is a valid priority range group string.
        Parameters:
        value - String String for check.
        Returns:
        True if input is a valid long value.
